upload.models module

class upload.models.questionAndSolution(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: django.db.models.base.Model

A class used to represent a questionAndSolution table in database. Using this table we can store and retrive questions and solutions related information.

…

subject

Indicate the name of the subject related to a question

Type

CharFiled

semester

Gives information about which semester’s question it is

Type

CharFiled

question

This file object will be be saved to the location specified by the upload to argument during saving

Type

FileFiled

solution

Takes solution file and saved to the database

Type

FileFiled

question

The descriptor for the file attribute on the model instance. Return a FieldFile when accessed so you can write code like:

>>> from myapp.models import MyModel
>>> instance = MyModel.objects.get(pk=1)
>>> instance.file.size

Assign a file object on assignment so you can do:

>>> with open('/path/to/hello.world') as f:
...     instance.file = File(f)

upload.views.showQuestionAndSolutionList(request)

Gets a html request object. Filter out all the information according to the request and pass the result to a template to show those in a form of table. Use a model :model:’upload.questionAndSolution’.

Context

“q”

[string]: A request send by the user for searching

“quesAndSolutions”

[list] : list of all questionAndSolution class objects that matches the subject or smester

Template:

Returns response to the quesAndSolveList.html template for showing the result

upload.views.uploadQuestionAndSolution(request)

Receives valus from a form. Validate the form data and than save to the database if they are valid. Use a model :model:’upload.questionAndSolution’.

Context

“form”

[questionAndSolutionForm]: An instance of questionAndSolutionForm class

Template:

Return response to upQuesAndSolveList.html page .
